book.title: Everything We Ever Wanted
book.description: Storyline: A late-night phone call on a Sunday evening rarely brings good news. So when Sylvie, a recently-widowed mother of two, receives a call from the head teacher of the school she's on the board of, she knows it won't be something she wants to hear.\n
book.author: Sara Shepard
